author: timbeiko
content:
Following from the previous ACD, how confident are the different client teams that they can have a release for London testnets mostly ready by next Friday (AllCoreDevs) and available to share publicly early the week after that (June 1-2)? 

This is basically the timeline we'd need if we fork Ropsten on June 9th, so we give at least 1 week's notice for testnets. <@&688090867927482525> <@&688101493978562687> <@&595684226221735986> <@&836981603216654336> <@&652918665943056397>
